long_description: Add a little extra warmth and softness to your sleeping bag with the Cocoon(R) Microfiber Mummy liner. Lightweight and efficient insulation adds comfort with minimal added weight. Liner protects and keeps your sleeping bag clean and can add up to 5degF to the temperature rating of your sleeping bag. 100% polyester microfiber is lightweight, breathable and feels soft next to skin. Machine wash the Cocoon Microfiber Mummy liner in cold water; tumble dry low.
short_description: Add a little extra warmth and softness to your sleeping bag with the Cocoon(R) Microfiber Mummy liner. Lightweight and efficient insulation adds comfort with minimal added weight.
